participant_1.background:
I love to support my local community by buying fresh produce from the farmers market.
I want to learn how to cook more healthy meals because I know fast food isn't good for my health.
I enjoy celebrating Thanksgiving with my friends in Chicago.
i enjoy watching baseball.
my brother is currently couch surfing at my house.

School is going well, but I'm looking forward to spending more time on my hobbies.
I spent more time with my wife and comics.
i like watching tv and movies.
Music calms my soul.
I grow my own vegetables and take daily walks.

content.text: Hey, I'm (user 1) and I'm from Chicago. How are you?
Hey, I'm (user 2) and I'm from New York. I'm doing well, thanks for asking!
Glad to hear it! What are some of your hobbies?
I love watching TV and movies, and I also like to read comics.
That's cool! I love watching TV and movies too. What are some of your favorite shows and movies?
I really like the Marvel Cinematic Universe, and I also like a lot of the DC Comics movies. I also like watching the Walking Dead.
Oh, I love the Marvel movies too! I'm really excited for the new one that's coming out next year.
Me too! I'm also excited for the new Star Wars movie that's coming out.
I'm not a big Star Wars fan, but I'm sure it will be good.
I hope so! What are some of your other hobbies?
I love to cook, and I also like to go to the farmers market. I'm trying to learn how to cook more healthy meals.
That's great! I love cooking too, but I'm not very good at it. I'm trying to learn more about cooking healthy meals too.
We should exchange recipes! I'm always looking for new recipes to try.
That would be great! I'm always looking for new recipes too.
It was great talking to you!
